definition: the eye is bewildered by five colors (idiom); a dazzling riot of colors
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display

sentences.english: "Five colors "idea was once "thinking law "By which the ancient flags were designed.
sentences.chinese: “五色”觀念曾是古人進行旗幡設計的“思維律”。

sentences.english: The city was gay with all colors of bunting .
sentences.chinese: 這個城市到處飄揚著五色繽紛的旗幟。

sentences.english: She put stones of various colors together and melted down them.
sentences.chinese: 女媧揀了許多五色的石子將它們融化。

sentences.english: With illustrations so numerous and so very highly coloured!
sentences.chinese: 那裏面有許多五色繽紛的插圖。

sentences.english: The colorful streamers , how many dreams have bore down upon it?
sentences.chinese: 五色經幡，究竟承載了多少夢想？

definition: five (main) colors (white, black, red, yellow, and blue)/multicolored
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
